sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import Footer from '../components/Footer' import Navbar from '../components/Navbar' import CalendarWithExercises from '../components/CalendarWithExercises' import Box from '@mui/material/Box'; import Button from '@mui/material/Button'; import EditIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Edit'; import Container from '@mui/material/Container'; import Typography from '@mui/material/Typography'; import { useContext, useState, createContext } from 'react' import { UserContext } from '../App'; import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import IconButton from '@mui/material/IconButton'; import CloseIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Close'; import {SliderSets} from '../components/SliderSets' import {SliderReps} from '../components/SliderReps' export const RoutineContext = createContext() const Routine = () => { const {allRoutines} = useContext(UserContext) const location = useLocation(); const [exerciseBannerOpen, setExerciseBannerOpen] = useState(false) const [exerciseClicked, setExerciseClicked] = useState(false) const [exerciseIndex, setExerciseIndex] = useState(false) const [editMode, setEditMode] = useState(false) const editionMode = () => { if (!editMode) { setEditMode(true) } else { setEditMode(false) } } const handleCloseGreenButton = () => { setExerciseClicked(false) setExerciseBannerOpen(false) } return ( <>
{location.state.exerciseTitle}
{exerciseClicked && exerciseBannerOpen &&
{exerciseClicked}
SETS: {allRoutines[location.state.index][exerciseIndex].sets}
REPS: {allRoutines[location.state.index][exerciseIndex].reps}
} {exerciseClicked && exerciseBannerOpen && editMode &&
{exerciseClicked}
}
) } export default Routine
